{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer AX11000 |revision=v1.0 |series=AX11000 |price=450 |est_release_date=01/2019 |fcc_date=12/19/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=announced |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7AX11000 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1735, 4AT-15 Z2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYMA |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 (Type A), USB 3.0 (Type C), |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1830 P21, 7CK-05 B2 W; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1830 P21, 7CK-05 B2 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1830 P21, 7CK-05 B2 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM84861 |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53134S;BCM53134SKFBG, TN1717 P21, 218-11 P3 W; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=2.5G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Bluetooth 5.0 Chip;Cypress;CYW20704;CYW2, 0704UA2, KFFB1G, 825 219;1;,,, 5GHz FEM;Skyworks;SKY85743;85743, 70760, 1840 MX;8;, |flags=MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, VHT160, Alexa, Bluetooth, IFTTT, LACP, Link Aggregation, Band Steering, DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |default_ssid=TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G, TP-Link_XXXX_5G_Gaming }}
:• 1x '''1148''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [[Wikipedia:IEEE_802.11ax|802.11ax]] (40MHz chan.) :• 2x '''4804''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [[Wikipedia:IEEE_802.11ax|802.11ax]] (160MHz chan.) = '''''AX11000'' class'''
{{TagLine|AX11000 MU-MIMO Tri-Band Gaming Router}} :[https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/cat-9_Archer-AX11000_V1-preview.html Product page] "101000ZAX11000 Rev1.0sp3" (is similar) is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net Announcements initially claimed that this was called the Archer AX1000 and that it is :a tri-band device with 8x8 MU-MIMO and maximum speeds of 10.747 Gbps. Some of these announcements have now been updated to call the device the AX11000 :and at least one article has been changed to say that the device offers 4x4 MU-MIMO. At least one announcement says that there are three co-processors to offload work from :the CPU which is supposedly a quad-core running at 1.8GHz. This suggests a [[Broadcom]] design with two 4x4:4 5GHz radios and 160MHz channel bandwidth. ===News=== *[https://www.tp-link.com/ro/news-details-18054.html ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 and AX11000 Routers Series'' on '''TP-LINK'''] (RO) *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/13697/tplink-announces-archer-ax6000-and-ax11000-wifi-6-80211ax-routers ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 and AX11000 Wi-Fi 6 Routers'' on '''AnandTech'''] ===See also=== * [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] * [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] * [[TP-LINK Archer AX6000]]
